description._content: Image taken from: Title: "California and Alaska and over the Canadian Pacific Railway. ... Second (popular) edition. Illustrated" Author: WEBB, William Seward. Putnam's Sons Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003871282 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
